title: Is it legal to panhandle at the street corners and do you know how much a panhandler makes in a day on an average?  Thanks.
text:
This previous post will answer part of your quetion:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8183 



As for how much panhandlers make, here's a related story about
buskers -- street musicians -- from Encore:



http://www.encorepub.com/a_a/blogs/blog1.php/2008/09/17/beggars-and-buskers-differentiating-the-





Your question has been assigned to one of our journalists. As soon as
it's posted, we'll send you an e-mail with a link to the answer.
